title: AI and Art Design Integration: Case-Based Creative Simulation Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design principles, experience with digital tools, and understanding of artificial intelligence concepts
context.additional_context: Experiencing real art creation processes in VR environments, with BYOD policies enabling individual device-based project implementation

learning_goals: Design and execute a digital art production process using AI models such as GANs and neural style transfer.
Critique and reinterpret over five AI-integrated art and design cases through case-based analysis.
Complete at least one AI-art integrated work using VR simulation tools in project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
